ref: 1895 *utskarati ʻ digs out ʼ. 2. *utskalati. 3. Caus. *utskā- rayati. 4. *utskālayati. 5. *utskr̥ta -- . &rcirclemacr &rcirclemacr 1. K. wŏkharun ʻ to turn upside down (e.g. in poking coals in a brazier) ʼ; Or. ukhuribā ʻ to poke, stir up ʼ; M. ukharṇẽ ʻ to scratch up, loosen or detach from ʼ.
Ku. wakhalṇo ʻ to be rooted up ʼ.
